thread.title: Revised sailings and cancellations next week
thread.title_full: Revised sailings and cancellations next week | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Revised sailings and cancellations next week
text:
Condor are cancelling some Liberation sailings and running a revised service over the next couple of days.
It is after two days of disruption following a problem with the boat's exhaust system.
All services on the Liberation are cancelled for Tuesday, so that the necessary repairs can be made.
The company is still asking all passengers with non-essential travel up until Wednesday, to consider cancelling their bookings to leave space for those that really need it.
Get the latest sailing information here .
Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Read more 21 updates Condor Liberation services cancelled after mechanical issues Travel Guernsey Jersey
